item.description:
https://www.facebook.com/events/457700644262493/

Who doesn't love dressing up as your favorite character! Video games, cartoons and movies will inspire some very creative costumes and will give you that unique shot to add to your portfolio.

We are looking for 10 Models and are limiting this to 20 photographers. Models, message me or e-mail to chris@worcesterphotostudios.com for consideration. Some examples of your costumes would be appreciated. Models by invite only.

Designers are also welcome, and encouraged. Please RSVP so we know what to expect.

Pre-registration is required for Photographers. Cost: $60 for photographers, $40 for Studio Members. Limit 20 photographers, so preregister today!
Paypal payment@worcesterphotostudios.com, call 800-210-9531, e-mail Chris@worcesterphotostudios.com or stop by to register.

Hair, Makeup artists and designers are free!

What to bring: Photographers can bring their own lights or use ours. There will be space for indoor and outdoor shooting. Props are encouraged. Designers should bring suits and accessories they would like to show off.

Code of conduct:

Alcohol and drugs are strictly prohibited at all times.

If you are attending one of our events, please take a moment to review this. 18+ Event. Inappropriate behavior will result in a verbal warning by a WPS staff member. If such behavior continues, you will be asked to leave.

These rules are put in place for everyone's safety and comfort. Any questions about Code Of Conduct or studio rules can be directed to info@worcesterphotostudios.com

Â
item.name: Cosplay Shoot
